get.description:
```graphql
query MyQuery @rbac(requireMatchAny: [admin]) {
  data:main_findManyadmin_provider {
    client_id
    client_secret
    created_time
    name
    owner
    sign_name
    template_code
    type
  }
}
```

```graphql
query MyQuery($skip: Int = 5, $take: Int = 10, $orderBy: [main_admin_apilogOrderByWithRelationInput]) {
  data: main_findManyadmin_apilog(skip: $skip, take: $take, orderBy: $orderBy) {
    id
    method
    ip
    path
    updatedAt
    ua
    userName
    userId
  }
}
```

```graphql
query GetManyMenu @rbac(requireMatchAny: [admin]) {
  data: main_findManycase_menu {
    id
    parentId
    label
    path
    icon
    sort
    level
    is_bottom
    menu_type
    perms
    api_id
    create_time
  }
}
```
